EmailTemplate.subject: AHS Preferred Contractors - WEX Fuel Card Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Introducing our Preferred National Account Fuel Card Program courtesy of American Home Shield’s new vendor relationship with WEX. All Preferred Contractors will have access to the following:
Save Money
• 1.7% rebate on your monthly fuel spend • Credited monthly 30 days in arrears via your fuel statement
Control Fuel
• Know who, what, where and how much your drivers spend • Control spending & security through by customizing your cards online
Convenience
• Your drivers only need to carry one card to purchase fuel and service at any participating location
Save Time
• Convenience of a single card for all fuel & service needs • Easy to read invoices • Transaction data easily downloaded to QuickBooks or Excel
Please fill out the attached one page credit application entitled ServiceMaster Addendum, and WEX will contact you regarding account set-up.
Monthly Invoice = 30 days
Payment terms = 26 days Credit line based on approval
